headline: American Express Declares Regular Quarterly Dividend
summary: NEW YORK, December 12, 2024--The Board of Directors of American Express Company (NYSE: AXP) has declared a regular quarterly dividend of $0.70 per common share, payable on February 10, 2025, to shareholders of record on January 3, 2025.
